verbs.description: so many people [V: are] climbing the iconic lloyd of london building that the firm is seeking an injunction to ban them the lloyd building has become a hotspot for urban climbers in recent years thanks to its design which makes it relatively easy to scale richard rogers lloyds building youtube lloyd climbing
